title: Ekko completely ruins the purpose of an assassination game mode.
body:
His ult is a free GA. Why allow him to be in it? The game is incredibly fun, I love it so much. I haven't had this much fun playing this game in a long time, but whenever I fight Ekko it feels like he's pointless to fight because he could just press R (That mind you is always up due to the gamemodes cooldown reduction + 40%/45% cdr) and make me feel like I pointlessly killed myself for nothing.

Posting here since there's too many "challengers" in reddit.

replies.body:
More often than not I see ekkos die instantly before they can even press r in this gamemode.
On the other hand..
{{champion:80}} Cancels 1 auto, burst you down himself, has a semiglobal ult, and ingeneral... why is he even here? If they want a semiglobal duelist champion nocturne exist..
nocturne would be a bit unfair with the whole dark screen every 20 seconds thing
Nocturne shouldn't be within a hundred miles of this mode, bit I agree that Pantheon shouldn't either. He and Diana both break the mode, imo.
{{champion:85}} is by far the worst. Huge AoE stun is bullshit in this mode
As someone who plays alot of Kennen, he's pretty much useless when his ult is on cd in this mode.
Kennen was the only real weird choice for me. It's like putting Twitch in the mode.
good thing ults dont have full CDs or anything

Well, the same can be said for most champions in that mode. Talon won't ever be caught, LB will just dodge everything, Shaco becomes invisible, Elise can rapper etc etc. Every champion has some annoying ability that prevents you from killing them, so Ekko isn't the only "unhealthy" one.
Then there is this item in the mode for no real reason:{{item:3157}}

My biggest complaints are:

 {{champion:164}} with {{item:3748}} is not a damn assassin. Hell, idk if I'd consider her an assassin over {{champion:56}} {{champion:11}} or {{champion:62}} 

{{champion:85}} isn't even close to an assassin. If we are including champs with blood moon skins then full ad {{champion:412}} pulls off 'assassinations' better than Kennen's AoE teamfight kit does.

Also wards. I feel like if the mode is meant to be assassins running around killing each other then why the fuck do we need wards, the bane of all assassins.
one stun makes his life miserable ez
Did you just say blood moon is fun? lol
What about {{champion:85}}? He can stun an entire team in under a second.
